name: Day 28 - Averted Vision
description:
- The Big Bang was the moment 13.8 billion years ago when the universe began as a tiny, dense, fireball that exploded. Most astronomers use the Big Bang theory to explain how the universe began.

- I am trying to give optical illusions and give the viewer the impression of movement, hidden images, flashing and vibrating patterns, or of swelling or warping.

info: 1080 x 1080 pixels , 300 frames, 30 fps. 4K wallpaper will be sent at the request of the collector.
